Title: Algorithms and reach enhancement for ultra high bandwidth transceivers
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC
Abstract: © 2016 OSA.The simultaneous reception of a DP-256QAM super-channel with an achievable information rate of 1.32Tb/s is demonstrated using a high bandwidth optical transceiver. An SNR improvement of 1dB is also demonstrated using MC-DBP after 2000km transmission.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
